record.dc:title: 226HA3 Hixon Mound Site 1HA3, Hamilton Co., Tennessee. Feature 77, Caved-in limestone slabs in top of grave, burial 1HA94. Square 25L14. Direction northeast.
record.wpa:narrative: Burial pit covered with flat limestone slabs.This pit was an elongated rectangle with somewhat rounded corners, dug from the floor level in Feature 68. The burial was covered with numerous limestone slabs supported by wooden cross pieces which had given way and let the slabs in on the burial. A few fragments of mineralized wood were apparent immediately above the skeleton and indicated that the wood ran crosswise of the grave.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration on file at the institution.
